svg.text: Experience.Work
86000 (Mobileware Technologies) — Associate AI Engineer
Designing AI automation systems reducing manual operations by 70–80%
Working in association with BrowsEZ on SaaS Control Plane tooling
Frontend: React + Vite platform for org onboarding & runtime instance management
Built UI for Middleware & MCP instances, OpenAPI-based Direct HTTP tool creation
Integrated custom tools & UI modules published via BrowsEZ CLI
Implemented observability dashboards with live logs via WebSocket / SSE
Connected to FastAPI backend using REST APIs + real-time streaming channels
Mahindra and Mahindra — AI Intern
Voice AI assistant handling 5,000+ daily calls (test drives, enquiries, lead updates)
Validated 60+ dialogue flows & 100+ prompt versions → 90% response stability
Built CCTV face recognition system (96% accuracy, <150ms latency in similarity matching)
Proposed AI background generation → 99% faster image production, 70–80% cost cut
Developed document forgery + cross-doc face match detection (90%+ fraud accuracy)
Experience.Publications
WanderVision
AI + Augmented Reality system to assist dementia patients with spatial awareness
Computer vision for object recognition + AR overlays for contextual guidance
Beyond the Pixels
Digital image forensics for originality detection & product condition assessment
Used feature analysis & vision pipelines to detect tampering and quality degradation
Domains: Computer Vision • Generative AI • Voice AI • NLP • End to End AI Automation Systems
